place_description:
Sustainability is the driver and focus of our coffee concept. Quality, ethical sourcing, and flavor are the criteria we search for when identifying local roasters to source our coffee beans. Featuring carefully curated coffee, tea, and juices, our expansive menu is reflective of the never-ending search for rich flavors and uncompromising quality. Our goal is to foster a community network of local business where people can develop an appreciation for local products. Choosing local roasters supports our community and guarantees the quality and freshness of our menu items.

There’s something special about the ritual of grabbing a fresh cup of coffee to get your day started or catching up with friends in our beloved Community.

reviews_data.review_text: Really quaint atmosphere. I had the moca which was rich and frothy. The service was excellent and the owner was kind and worked upfront with her employees which I really liked and it seemed like a really great work environment. The only drawback I had is the lack of seating but it is kinda a granted because of the small building but full 5 stars would highly recommend!
Really comfortable seating and the jalapeno & cheddar scones were soo good!
What a great new space! The lavender latte was out of this world. The baristas are cheery and gracious. I cannot wait to try their other creations.
I just got a latte and MAN o MAN. It's amazing! So excited for a great coffee shop in the area!

Service, food and atmosphere were excellent! Joy, Rashad and the team were so great and made the experience even better! Oh, and the music... spot on! I encourage everyone to go, I will DEFINITELY be back!

So great to have a local coffee shop in the University City/Mallard Creek area...and oh what a lovely space!  The atmosphere is inviting and comfortable.  We tried a dirty chai latte, a toasted marshmallow latte, and the cheddar jalapeno scone...all were delicious!  The owners, Joy and Rashad, are so friendly, kind, and gracious.  Mariah, the cashier was also awesome!  The other staff, Mariah, and the owners checked on us during our visit.  I can't wait to go back!  I'm craving a scone!
